commitResults.messageTitle: Level-1: added code to greet user, accept input and bid farewell to the user and added .class files to gitignore file
Duke.java: added mark and unmark functionalities for tasks Task.java: created task class to store if a task a marked and its description
Duke.java: added 3 different types of tasks and their functionalities Deadline.java: added deadline class Event.java: added event class Todo.java: added todo class
EXPECTED.TXT: added expected output input.txt: added test commands

Duke.java: Added functions to handle checked exceptions Expected.txt: updated intended test results of new tests input.txt: added new tests for exception handling DukeException.java: added new Exception class
Duke.java: added delete task function and replaced task array with arraylist input.txt: added more tests for delete function EXPECTED.TXT: added expected behaviour for new tests for delete function
Add saving tasks to file functionality
commitResults.messageBody: Save tasks in a text file 'data/duke.txt' relative to the project root to be retrieved when using Duke again.

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/Duke.java

commitResults.messageBody: Add Command and children classes, Ui class, Parser Class, Storage Class.

Add JUnit tests for Parser and TaskList classes
Fix bugs in Parser class and Storage class

Tweak code to comply with coding standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Update build.gradle to run Launcher as main class
commitResults.messageBody: Run GUI instead of CLI interface when duke is ran
Exceptions are handled in the AddCommand classes. Ensure that these Exceptions are caught and the appropriate task number is passed to TaskList functions

commitResults.messageTitle: Add comments for lines with abstracted functions
commitResults.messageBody: There are many abstractions of functions in separate classes. Add the description of abstracted function to explain why function is applied

commitResults.messageTitle: Add streams to find function of TaskList.
commitResults.messageBody:
There is manually array iteration used to match search word to every stored task.

Streams can be used for this task so that the code is more concise.

Add assertions to the TaskList class

To ensure correct input is provided for mark, unmark and delete functions in the TaskList class.

Correct input for these functions should be a valid task number.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/cjyothika/ip into branch-A-Streams
commitResults.messageBody: Update Stream with changes from A-Assertions branch to master

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/duke/command/DeleteCommand.java
Include both comment and code change to throw exception when invalid task index is passed to DeleteCommand on execute function use

Add streams to TaskList find function

Use streams to simplify existing code that uses manual ArrayList iteration.

Improve code quality

Add more comments to Parser class to explain why certain functions are called on the user input to extract key information.

Add "stats" command that returns number of done and undone tasks at the moment.

Do this through the new StatsCommand class which calls the stats function of a TaskList object to return the required information in a string format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug related to GUI where some text is cutoff by the next dialog container
commitResults.messageBody: Let's enable the wrapText property to do so.

commitResults.messageTitle: Catch more exceptions and throw them with a message that user can understand
commitResults.messageBody:
There are exceptions caught that exposes code to User such as
invalid enum.

This violates information hiding and abstraction.

Let's catch these exceptions and display them to user in a
user-friendly manner such as "I don't know what that means".

commitResults.messageTitle: Add text emojis to messages to add personality to Eggduke
commitResults.messageBody: Emojis add a personal feel
Let's set the title to the window generated by JavaFx.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add black border to text input box

commitResults.messageBody: Add instructions on how to set-up and use EggDuke for users
Duplicate README.md in docs folder

Correct formatting error in header

Set-up instructions header is at wrong level.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add test for find function in TaskList class and edit javadocs to fit conventions
commitResults.messageBody:
Extra test using the same test case for add and delete functions is
used to check if find function is working appropriately as well

Some header comments are not using the correct verbs which makes
Javadocs comments inconsistent.

Let's attempt to make all comments
uniform.

  Update README.md

commitResults.messageTitle: Update User guide to reflect correct jar file name to avoid confusion
commitResults.messageBody:
Release is called duke.jar but user guide refers to release as
Duke.jar.

Let's keep the name of the release as duke.jar in both places.
